trans-unit.id: 4 MIN
trans-unit.source: 4 MIN

trans-unit.id: A moment of allowing… a moment of being.
trans-unit.source: A moment of allowing… a moment of being.

trans-unit.id: A self-guided and personal space where you can select exercises, reflections, and practices that best support your journey toward self-acceptance. You're free to end the session anytime you need and repeat it whenever you want.
trans-unit.source: A self-guided and personal space where you can select exercises, reflections, and practices that best support your journey toward self-acceptance. You're free to end the session anytime you need and repeat it whenever you want.
trans-unit.note: Text that explains the user how to start the session

trans-unit.id: A space designed to support individuals who are navigating body dysmorphia with self-awareness and a desire for change.
trans-unit.source: A space designed to support individuals who are navigating body dysmorphia with self-awareness and a desire for change.
trans-unit.note: Information about the app

trans-unit.source: About

trans-unit.id: And when you’re ready… gently release your hands… knowing that this sense of warmth and care is always within reach.
trans-unit.source: And when you’re ready… gently release your hands… knowing that this sense of warmth and care is always within reach.

trans-unit.id: Are you sure you want to leave?
trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to leave?

trans-unit.id: Can you allow yourself to be worthy of this moment, just as you are?
trans-unit.source: Can you allow yourself to be worthy of this moment, just as you are?

trans-unit.id: Can you let yourself receive this small act of care as you would accept a gift from a dear friend?
trans-unit.source: Can you let yourself receive this small act of care as you would accept a gift from a dear friend?
Complete
trans-unit.note: A button that allows the user to go back to the home screen after completing the session, the button give the idea of had completed it.

trans-unit.id:
Connect with your body and embrace self-kindness. Through guided exercises and mindfulness, you'll build a healthier, more balanced relationship with yourself—at your own pace, without pressure.
You’re in the right place. Let’s begin.
trans-unit.source:
Connect with your body and embrace self-kindness. Through guided exercises and mindfulness, you'll build a healthier, more balanced relationship with yourself—at your own pace, without pressure.
You’re in the right place. Let’s begin.
trans-unit.note: The text of the onboarding

trans-unit.source: Continue
trans-unit.note: A button to continue to the next screen of the onboarding Button text to continue the onboarding process after the user has inserted their name

trans-unit.source: Done

trans-unit.id: Enter your name
trans-unit.source: Enter your name

trans-unit.id: Focus on your heartbeat
trans-unit.source: Focus on your heartbeat

trans-unit.id: Give yourself a little squeeze.
trans-unit.source: Give yourself a little squeeze.

trans-unit.id: Give yourself gentle strokes
trans-unit.source: Give yourself gentle strokes

trans-unit.id: Guided Session
trans-unit.source: Guided Session
trans-unit.note: Title that welcome the user after selecting Guided Session mode in the menu

trans-unit.id: HOW WOULD YOU LIKE TO BE CALLED?
trans-unit.source: HOW WOULD YOU LIKE TO BE CALLED?

trans-unit.id: Hello, %@
trans-unit.source: Hello, %@
trans-unit.note: Title of the app, it give a greeting to the the user as Hello, UserName

trans-unit.id: How does it feel to offer yourself this moment of comfort?
trans-unit.source: How does it feel to offer yourself this moment of comfort?

trans-unit.id: How does this feel?
trans-unit.source: How does this feel?

trans-unit.id: How would you like to be called?
trans-unit.source: How would you like to be called?
trans-unit.note: The title of the view where the user can insert their name inside a text field

trans-unit.id: I want to invite you to practice on your own, and feel free to experiment.
trans-unit.source: I want to invite you to practice on your own, and feel free to experiment.

trans-unit.id: If it feels right, you can explore different forms of touch. A light, soothing hold. A gentle press. A slow movement of your hands as if offering reassurance.
trans-unit.source: If it feels right, you can explore different forms of touch. A light, soothing hold. A gentle press. A slow movement of your hands as if offering reassurance.

trans-unit.id: If you like, you can move your thumb gently, exploring this sensation.
trans-unit.source: If you like, you can move your thumb gently, exploring this sensation.

trans-unit.id: If you’d like, you can close your eyes and allow yourself to settle into this moment.
trans-unit.source: If you’d like, you can close your eyes and allow yourself to settle into this moment.

trans-unit.id: Insert Later
trans-unit.source: Insert Later
trans-unit.note: Button text that is below a continue button, allowing the user to continue the onboarding process without entering a name

trans-unit.id: Insert name
trans-unit.source: Insert name

trans-unit.id: Inspired by research on self-compassion and supportive touch, our approach encourages gentle, non-judgmental engagement with your body, helping you shift towards a more balanced and appreciative self-perception.
trans-unit.source: Inspired by research on self-compassion and supportive touch, our approach encourages gentle, non-judgmental engagement with your body, helping you shift towards a more balanced and appreciative self-perception.
trans-unit.note: Information about the app

trans-unit.id: It's okay to take a break. You can always come back whenever you're ready.
trans-unit.source: It's okay to take a break. You can always come back whenever you're ready.

trans-unit.id: Just begin by bringing your left hand up to your cheek and cradling your face in your hand.
trans-unit.source: Just begin by bringing your left hand up to your cheek and cradling your face in your hand.

trans-unit.id: Just feel the contact of this hand.
trans-unit.source: Just feel the contact of this hand.

trans-unit.id: Just like every human being, you deserve care, understanding, and gentleness.
trans-unit.source: Just like every human being, you deserve care, understanding, and gentleness.

trans-unit.id: Just taking a moment to feel these two hands, perhaps imagining that they are caring hands, offering kindness and warmth.
trans-unit.source: Just taking a moment to feel these two hands, perhaps imagining that they are caring hands, offering kindness and warmth.

trans-unit.id: Leave Session
trans-unit.source: Leave Session

trans-unit.id: Let the glowing dots guide your hands with mindfulness and intention.
trans-unit.source: Let the glowing dots guide your hands with mindfulness and intention.
trans-unit.note: Text that explains the user how to start the session

trans-unit.id: Let your body soften just a little… and take a gentle breath—no need to change anything, just noticing your inhale and exhale.
trans-unit.source: Let your body soften just a little… and take a gentle breath—no need to change anything, just noticing your inhale and exhale.

trans-unit.id: Let yourself rest in this space, even if just for a few breaths.
trans-unit.source: Let yourself rest in this space, even if just for a few breaths.

trans-unit.id: Listen to what your own body tells you.
trans-unit.source: Listen to what your own body tells you.
Meditation
trans-unit.note: Button option in sound settings for meditation sound, visible in the sound picker

trans-unit.source: Melody
trans-unit.note: Button option in sound settings for melody sound, visible in the sound picker

trans-unit.id: Move slowly and with both hands cup your elbows
trans-unit.source: Move slowly and with both hands cup your elbows

trans-unit.id: Move your hand down a little bit to your shoulder.
trans-unit.source: Move your hand down a little bit to your shoulder.

trans-unit.id: Move your other hand and rest gently on both of your shoulders
trans-unit.source: Move your other hand and rest gently on both of your shoulders
None
trans-unit.note: Button option in sound settings, no sound selected, visible in the sound picker

trans-unit.source: Notification

trans-unit.id: Notification Settings
trans-unit.source: Notification Settings

trans-unit.id: Notification Time
trans-unit.source: Notification Time

trans-unit.id: Now keep going down your arms and put your hands together
trans-unit.source: Now keep going down your arms and put your hands together

trans-unit.id: Now move one hand over your heart space, and one over your tummy.
trans-unit.source: Now move one hand over your heart space, and one over your tummy.

trans-unit.id: Now, bring awareness to your hands. Feel their warmth, their presence, the gentle contact with your body.
trans-unit.source: Now, bring awareness to your hands. Feel their warmth, their presence, the gentle contact with your body.

trans-unit.id: Or simply recognize that this gesture is coming from you—to you. A quiet offering of kindness, no expectations, no demands.
trans-unit.source: Or simply recognize that this gesture is coming from you—to you. A quiet offering of kindness, no expectations, no demands.

trans-unit.id: Our mission is to help you cultivate a healthier connection with your body through self-compassion, body-focused exercises, and mindful practices.
trans-unit.source: Our mission is to help you cultivate a healthier connection with your body through self-compassion, body-focused exercises, and mindful practices.
trans-unit.note: Information about the app

trans-unit.id: Perhaps you can imagine them as kind, caring hands—offering comfort, support, and understanding.
trans-unit.source: Perhaps you can imagine them as kind, caring hands—offering comfort, support, and understanding.
Piano
trans-unit.note: Button option in sound settings for piano sound, visible in the sound picker

trans-unit.id: Picture yourself as someone truly deserving of compassion—because you are.
trans-unit.source: Picture yourself as someone truly deserving of compassion—because you are.
Relaxing
trans-unit.note: Button option in sound settings for relaxing sound, visible in the sound picker

trans-unit.id: Select Time
trans-unit.source: Select Time
Settings

trans-unit.id: Slowly move your hands down on your biceps
trans-unit.source: Slowly move your hands down on your biceps

trans-unit.id: So now, we're going to practice together
trans-unit.source: So now, we're going to practice together
Sound

trans-unit.id: Sound Settings
trans-unit.source: Sound Settings

trans-unit.id: Sound Type
trans-unit.source: Sound Type
Start
trans-unit.note: Button to start the session.

trans-unit.id: Take a deep breath and begin when you're ready.
trans-unit.source: Take a deep breath and begin when you're ready.
trans-unit.note: Text that explains the user how to start the session

trans-unit.id: There is nothing to force… nothing to fix… just a quiet moment of connection with yourself.
trans-unit.source: There is nothing to force… nothing to fix… just a quiet moment of connection with yourself.

trans-unit.id: There is nothing you need to prove… nothing you need to earn. Right here, in this moment, you are enough.
trans-unit.source: There is nothing you need to prove… nothing you need to earn. Right here, in this moment, you are enough.

trans-unit.id: This journey is personal, and progress looks different for everyone. Whether you're taking your first step or deepening your practice, Ombrace is here to guide you in fostering a more positive and compassionate relationship with yourself.
trans-unit.source: This journey is personal, and progress looks different for everyone. Whether you're taking your first step or deepening your practice, Ombrace is here to guide you in fostering a more positive and compassionate relationship with yourself.
trans-unit.note: Information about the app

trans-unit.id: This position is nice because you can use it anywhere, anytime.
trans-unit.source: This position is nice because you can use it anywhere, anytime.

trans-unit.id: This small act of kindness is always available to you.
trans-unit.source: This small act of kindness is always available to you.

trans-unit.id: To return to it when you need a reminder that you are not alone, that you are worthy of kindness?
trans-unit.source: To return to it when you need a reminder that you are not alone, that you are worthy of kindness?

trans-unit.id: Try to follow along
trans-unit.source: Try to follow along

trans-unit.id: Use any posture or position that helps you feel calm, and let go of the rest.
trans-unit.source: Use any posture or position that helps you feel calm, and let go of the rest.
User
trans-unit.note: Default username variable if the user dont set one, it is used on the greeting Hello, User

trans-unit.id: Welcome to Ombrace!
trans-unit.source: Welcome to Ombrace!
trans-unit.note: Ombrace is the name of the app, is a welcoming title The title of the Onboarding, Ombrace is the name of the App

trans-unit.id: Well done!
trans-unit.source: Well done!
trans-unit.note: I title that explains to the user that has completed the session

trans-unit.id: What do you notice in your body as you do? Is there warmth, a sense of ease—or maybe just the simple awareness of being here?
trans-unit.source: What do you notice in your body as you do? Is there warmth, a sense of ease—or maybe just the simple awareness of being here?

trans-unit.id: What does it feel like when you support yourself, like a good friend?
trans-unit.source: What does it feel like when you support yourself, like a good friend?

trans-unit.id: What feels most comforting in this moment? And if something doesn’t feel quite right, can you give yourself permission to adjust or let it go?
trans-unit.source: What feels most comforting in this moment? And if something doesn’t feel quite right, can you give yourself permission to adjust or let it go?

trans-unit.id: What happens in your nervous system, in your body, when you offer yourself a little bit of soothing, supportive touch?
trans-unit.source: What happens in your nervous system, in your body, when you offer yourself a little bit of soothing, supportive touch?

trans-unit.id: What if, instead of judging yourself, you simply offered understanding?
trans-unit.source: What if, instead of judging yourself, you simply offered understanding?

trans-unit.id: What if, instead of pushing through, you allowed yourself to pause?
trans-unit.source: What if, instead of pushing through, you allowed yourself to pause?

trans-unit.id: What if, just for a moment, you allowed yourself to be held in this gentle kindness, without resistance or hesitation?
trans-unit.source: What if, just for a moment, you allowed yourself to be held in this gentle kindness, without resistance or hesitation?

trans-unit.id: What would it be like to carry this sense of care with you throughout the day?
trans-unit.source: What would it be like to carry this sense of care with you throughout the day?

trans-unit.id: What would it be like to receive this touch with an open heart?
trans-unit.source: What would it be like to receive this touch with an open heart?

trans-unit.id: Whether you’re sitting quietly at home, in the middle of a busy day, or moving through the world… you can return to this gentle touch whenever you need a moment of support.
trans-unit.source: Whether you’re sitting quietly at home, in the middle of a busy day, or moving through the world… you can return to this gentle touch whenever you need a moment of support.

trans-unit.id: While we are not medical professionals, our methods are rooted in scientific studies that emphasize kindness, acceptance, and connection as tools for well-being.
trans-unit.source: While we are not medical professionals, our methods are rooted in scientific studies that emphasize kindness, acceptance, and connection as tools for well-being.
trans-unit.note: Information about the app

trans-unit.source: Yoga
trans-unit.note: Button option in sound settings for yoga sound, visible in the sound picker

trans-unit.id: You are worthy of kindness—especially from yourself.
trans-unit.source: You are worthy of kindness—especially from yourself.
trans-unit.note: Information about the app

trans-unit.id: You can close your eyes if you like, so that you can pay attention to what’s happening in your body.
trans-unit.source: You can close your eyes if you like, so that you can pay attention to what’s happening in your body.

trans-unit.id: You can return to it anytime… like a soft whisper of kindness… reminding you that you are worthy of love and compassion, just as you are.
trans-unit.source: You can return to it anytime… like a soft whisper of kindness… reminding you that you are worthy of love and compassion, just as you are.

trans-unit.id: You completed the session! You should be proud of what you have accomplished today.
trans-unit.source: You completed the session! You should be proud of what you have accomplished today.
trans-unit.note: A text that explains to the user that has completed the session

trans-unit.id: You might even picture someone you love placing their hands there, offering the same warmth and care.
trans-unit.source: You might even picture someone you love placing their hands there, offering the same warmth and care.

trans-unit.id: Your Session
trans-unit.source: Your Session
trans-unit.note: Title that welcome the user after selecting Your Session mode in the menu
